sections.title: SmartCard reader
sections.content: Works out-of-the-box with ccid & opensc . Read Smartcards for more info.

sections.title: NFC reader
sections.content:
Although it is detected by pc_scan, RF field is not present thus no signal is detected. For enabling the NFC, this python script is needed:

https://github.com/jacekkow/controlvault2-nfc-enable

python and python-pyusb are needed.

sections.title: Fingerprint reader
sections.content: libfprint-2-tod1-broadcomAUR is needed to enable the fprint.
